meanings.sent1: Our family enjoys watching movies on the goggleboxes in the living room.
meanings.sent2: The goggleboxes in the store displayed vibrant colors to attract customers.
meanings.sent3: The goggleboxes in the electronics store seemed to be whispering 'take me home!'
meanings.sent4: The goggleboxes in the store were like magical windows into different worlds.
meanings.sent5: The goggleboxes in the store were like colorful storytellers, captivating all who passed by.

meanings.sent1: The children goggleboxes at the magician's tricks during the show.
meanings.sent2: She goggleboxes in amazement at the fireworks lighting up the night sky.
meanings.sent3: The puppy goggleboxes at the squirrel running along the fence.
meanings.sent4: His eyes goggleboxes as he witnesses the incredible magic trick.
